transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, yes ma'am.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Ma'am Brijesh bol raha hu IndiaMART se. Ma'am actually maine morning me maine aapko bataya tha na isme.
Customer: Haan haan ho gaya.
Executive: Shotout ho gaya.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Dekho aap close kar dijiye aap.
Customer: Haan, actually ma'am aur bhi mujhe aapse discuss karna hai. Ek to ki usko wo to problem aapki solve ho gayi.
Executive: Dusri cheez hai ma'am ki jo aapke catalogs me jo catalog score hai na wo wo kaafi down hai.
Executive: Okay. Mujhse aap thoda sa bata sakte hai.
Customer: Aap boliye to mai whatsapp pe sara detail bhej deti hu. Mai chahti hu ki catalog ye sab sara aap update kar dijiye.
Executive: Thik hai. Ma'am haan aap mera number aap write down kar lo ma'am.
Customer: Actually aapka number to IndiaMART ka show ho raha hai. Mera number likh lijiye 7258.
Executive: Rukiye ek second just wait.
Customer: Usme aapko kya kya chahiye, kis product ka feedback chahiye mujhe bataiye.
Executive: Ma'am mai mai mai abhi mai abhi bata deta hu aap uske according mujhe share kar dena mai khud update kar dunga koi dikkat nahi hai. Kya number hai ma'am please please number kya hai?
Customer: 77258.
Executive: 58.
Customer: 001412.
Executive: 00?
Customer: 1412.
Executive: Ma'am aapki voice thodi break hui hai. 00 ke baad nahi aaya mujhe.
Customer: 7258001412.
Executive: 1412. Name, thik hai, haan thik hai. Haan wo to ho gaya ma'am. Mujhe thoda sa ek cheez aur discuss karna hai. B rank matlab aap uski leads consume kar rahe hai but uske profile me abhi update nahi hai. To wo mujhe thoda sa bata dijiye. Ek hai aapka aluminium sliding door.
Customer: Aluminium ka kaaba hum log chhod diye hai sir.
Executive: Achha wo chhod diye ma'am.
Customer: Usko hataiye.
Executive: To ma'am wo aapke system se hatega.
Customer: Isliye chalte hai kyuki agar sliding door ko aluminium pe kare to hum log usko convince karne ka rakhte hai ek option ki convince kare to shayad ye conversion convert ho jaye.
Executive: Nahi nahi to ma'am agar wo.
Customer: To ma'am haan ma'am aapko bata raha hu ma'am wo aapke system se hatega exclude kar dijiye wo yaha se hat jayega. Second second cheez hai aapka waterproof ply plywood.
Customer: Haan isme aap isme padte hai sir?
Executive: Wo rahega.
Customer: Haan haan wo thik hai usme hum karte hai ye.
Executive: Waterproof.
Customer: Wo karte hai.
Executive: Ply wood. Ek hai ma'am decorative mirror karke hai aapka product.
Customer: Haan wo bhi rahega. Mirror.
Executive: Wo bhi rahega.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Sorry mera calling khatam ho gaya abhi mai time nahi de paungi thik hai na.
Executive: Ma'am nahi nahi mai jo jo hai na sirf mujhe likhwa dijiye. Ek hai aapka century century ply.
Customer: Second aapne 4-5 baje tak call ki thi. Maine aapko time bhi bataya tha aap bola timing pe call kar denge. 
Executive: I know mujhe ma'am do se do se teen minute mujhe time dijiye because of kuch product product related mai aapke discuss kar.
Customer: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Catalog score is down.

- Profile not updated.

- Wants to remove aluminum sliding door.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to share details on WhatsApp.

- Executive will update the catalog.

- Executive confirmed aluminum door will be removed.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, update, leads, product, profile
